nodes.text: A man was, according to Starros clan legend, the enemy of Caden Starros. The story told by the family about him was that he had stolen Caden's starship and stranded him on a minor moon. After Caden's escape, he tracked the man all the way to Orondia to take his revenge. By the time of Caden's great-granddaughter Avon, the family did not know whether the legend was actually true, but in the immediate aftermath of the destruction of the Steady Wing as a result of sabotage, Avon believed that the tale of revenge told in the story was more logical than sitting around and doing nothing.
